Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Hotjobs.com and E*Trade online brokerage firm are starting new advertising campaigns (S)

block.p: Two dot-com companies that advertise a lot are starting campaigns with new themes. ''Onward. Upward'' is the new one for the Hotjobs.com job search site, based in New York, replacing ''The hottest hand on the Web.'' The campaign is the first from the new Hotjobs.com agency, Weiss Stagliano Partners in New York. Hotjobs.com has advertised in the last two Super Bowls. And the E*Trade online brokerage firm will begin using ''It's your money,'' to replace ''It's time for E*Trade,'' in a new batch of humorous commercials by Goodby, Silverstein & Partners in San Francisco, part of the Omnicom Group. Brandweek reported that E*Trade planned for the second consecutive year to sponsor the Super Bowl halftime show, but Kim Brooks, a spokeswoman, said it was ''too early'' to discuss such plans.
